changeSet.sql: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trigger_propagate_attribute_network_deductions ON ruleform.attribute_network;

CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER trigger_propagate_attribute_network_deductions AFTER INSERT OR DELETE ON ruleform.attribute_network DEFERRABLE INITIALLY DEFERRED FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE ruleform.propagate_attribute_network_deductions();
